monthlyNotes.notes: Plan the garden; Manure/Compost + plow (if not done in fall); Test soil and add lime, sulfur, fertilizer as needed; Order seeds; Plan indoor starter area, assess materials needed
Prepare the garden; Plant: carrots, collards, lettuce, mustard, english peas, irish potatoes, radishes, spinach, turnips, rapini; Mid/end of month start seeds: herbs, tomatoes, peppers, cukes
Plant #2: turnips, radishes, mustard, spring onions; Thin seedlings if needed; Prep rows for warm-season vegetables planted in April
